definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Chen Shui-Bian (1950-), Taiwanese DPP 民進黨|民进党 politician, president of the Republic of China 2000-2008
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
Chen Yunlin (1941-), chairman of PRC Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits (ARATS) 海峽兩岸關係協會|海峡两岸关系协会[Hai3 xia2 Liang3 an4 Guan1 xi5 Xie2 hui4] (2008-2013)
Eason Chan (1974-), Hong Kong pop singer and actor
to push out the old and bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
Chen Yi (1901-1972), communist general and politician, Marshal of PLA from 1955, Mayor of Shanghai in 1950s, PRC foreign minister 1958-1972
Edison Chen (1980-), Hong Kong singer and actor

sentences.english: Eric Suen Yiu Wai and Chan Fa La felt embarrassed when they were playing heartbeat measurement.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威和陳法拉玩量度心跳，都感尷尬。

sentences.english: He rode on, blood flowing from his side.
sentences.chinese: 他騎滅馬，陳血從腰部流上去。

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學的金融學教授陳志武也贊同這一看法。

sentences.english: The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察還極力敦促他儘快將女兒的遺體火化，陳廣乾說。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 經醫院搶救，陳勇軍目前仍處於昏迷之中。

sentences.english: But Chen Qingyang came down the hill looking for me again.
sentences.chinese: 可是陳清揚又從山上跑下來找我。

sentences.english: Ms Chen qian cloud find seven dead, want to kill dato may other people.
sentences.chinese: 倩雲查到陳七女士已死，要殺拿督的可能其它人。

sentences.english: She is probably unaware of Yogi Chen's will.
sentences.chinese: 她可能不知道陳上師的遺囑。

sentences.english: The third section is on the values of Chen Peixun's Piano Music works.
sentences.chinese: 第三節，陳培勳鋼琴音樂作品的價值體現。

sentences.english: Police say Chin appeared fine when guards brought breakfast to his cell.
sentences.chinese: 警方稱陳在獄卒給他送早餐的時候看上去一切正常。

sentences.english: Chen accuses his son of being not filial and asks for solatium .
sentences.chinese: 陳平狀告兒子不孝，並且索要贍養費。

sentences.english: Li told him there were two ways to resolve the situation, Chen said.
sentences.chinese: 李剛講解決問題有兩條路，陳廣乾說。
2008年4月17日，陳勇軍和王莉協議離婚了。

sentences.english: I'am Chen Tianming , from Shanghai post and telecommuincate service development company, I'am direct of the company's overseas department.
sentences.chinese: 我是上海郵電服務發展公司還外部主任陳天明。

sentences.english: The authors suggest that the Chencai Group is one of the possible source bed for uranium deposits formed.
sentences.chinese: 作者認爲，陳蔡羣是形成鈾礦牀的可能鈾源層之一。

sentences.english: Although the stone inflammation does utmost, still had lost to Chen Fei.
sentences.chinese: 雖然石炎竭盡全力，仍是輸給了陳飛。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
